round_best: Develop an adaptive "user persona" framework for LLMs that constructs and refines dynamic, pseudo-individual profiles based on minimal user interactions. Utilizing few-shot learning techniques, the framework would initially extrapolate a provisional user persona from early interactions and subsequently refine this persona through ongoing dialogue, leveraging user corrections and implicit feedback to enhance model personalization. This approach minimizes the need for extensive personal data collection while allowing the AI to adaptively align with evolving user preferences and behaviors over time.
